mapper.select: select student.id student_id, student.disabled_flag, student.head_img, student.grade_type, student.password, student.encrypt, student.login_ip, student.login_count, student.name as student_name, school.name as school_name, case student.sex when 1 then '男' when 2 then '女' else '未知' end sex from student_info student left join school_info school on student.school_id = school.id where student.login_name = #{loginName}
